page.title: 12Mormon Missionaries(Riccall)
page.content: Q.What time do you go out and knock on doors at{Riccall?} A.9.30 A.M._9.30 P.M. Q.How many people let you in at Riccall? A.A high percentage. Q.When you go to Riccall how many people agree with your church? A.When they listen,they find much in common with there own beliefs.We also find people are amazed to find that we teach what they have secretly been thinking. Q.How long do you stay? A.5_15 min.(A lesson takes 30_45min.) Q.How many people have been baptized? A.7 families in this last year. Q.How many days do you work here? A.Twice a week.
